posts.title: My first post
posts.content: Well, this is the first post on my new blog. Isn't that something?

posts.title: My second post
posts.content: Nothing much new to report. Still here.

posts.title: Game of Thrones
posts.content: Finally saw the end of Game of Thrones. Kind of a downer.

posts.title: Astronomy Picture of the Day
posts.content: If you like great pictures and photography, and especially if you enjoy images of space and the Earth's sky, I recommend 'Astronomy Picture of the Day (apod.nasa.gov)'.
